Unrolling the Shutter

  • A Convolutional Neural Network that corrects the distortion caused due to rolling shutter of the camera from a single image.

Image Captioning

  • A combination of a CNN and an LSTM networks that gives a caption for the input image.
  • Different versions of the network by tweaking LSTM,
        1. Traditional LSTM
        2. With attention
        3. With sentinel gate
